metadata.name: Apache Spark Shell Command Injection - ProcessCreation
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to exploit an apache spark server via CVE-2014-6287 from a commandline perspective

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\bash')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('id -gn `')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('id -gn \''))))

output.summary: Detects attempts to exploit an apache spark server via CVE-2014-6287 from a commandline perspective
